Item.Value: ORDER BY PL.ADDDATETIME DESC, PL.ALBUM, ABS(PL.TRACK), PL.ID #LIMIT#
INNER JOIN (SELECT ID,SORT FROM PLAYINGLIST) PLAYING ON PL.ID=PLAYING.ID ORDER BY PLAYING.SORT
AND LASTPLAYDATE IS NOT NULL ORDER BY LASTPLAYDATE DESC #LIMIT#
AND PLAYCOUNT > 2 ORDER BY PLAYCOUNT / ROUND(JULIANDAY(DATETIME('NOW', 'LOCALTIME')) - JULIANDAY(DATETIME(ADDDATE))) DESC #LIMIT#
AND RATING <> 9 ORDER BY PLAYCOUNT / ROUND(JULIANDAY(DATETIME('NOW', 'LOCALTIME')) - JULIANDAY(DATETIME(ADDDATE))) DESC #LIMIT#

Item.DisplayValue: 最近再生していないもの
Item.Value: AND LASTPLAYDATE IS NOT NULL AND PLAYCOUNT > 0 ORDER BY LASTPLAYDATE #LIMIT#
AND LASTPLAYDATE IS NULL ORDER BY ADDDATETIME DESC,ABS(PL.TRACK), PL.ID
AND GETFILESIZE(FILEPATH,'') = 0 ORDER BY PL.ID DESC
